Hello LET,

We have been in service since 2 years and counting!

Our special offer:

- CPU: 1 db vCore
- Ram: 256 MB
- Disk: 10 GB
- Network: 100 Mbit/s
- IPv4 address: 1
- IPv6 address: 65 536 ( /112 subnet )

Price: 4.99 USD/months  or  48 USD/years

Order: http://members.xethost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=39

Paymanets accepted: PayPal, Bank transfer


If you are interested another VPS package: http://xethost.com/classic-vps/

Virtualization: VMware ESXi

Location: Budapest - HUNGARY (HU)

Test file: http://xethost.com/test/1GiB

(Tos: no stressers, no smtp replay, no copyrighted content, no public proxy, no miners,)

Best Regards,

Balázs
XetHost
